header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

oh we were on holiday once when we were quite young and we went away for Christmas and we went to the little church and did their carol service late at night when we came out and the snow was falling oh it was absolutely magical it really was it was lovely then we had to walk back to wherever we were staying that was beautiful it really was

memories like that I remember going to the flea pit the Ritz it was called up the and er well we used to go to the flea pit and er we went in Saturday afternoon and it was called matinee Saturday afternoon matinee for kids sixpence that it used to cost you to get in and we went in and when we come out there was six inches of snow everywhere that was fantastic instead of playing Hopalong Cassidy on our way home we played snowballs
